Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngakho-ke samphonsa ogwini olomile kulapho yena egula
Futhi samilisa isihlahla soselwa phezulu kwakhe
Futhi samthumela kwabayinkulungwane noma ngaphezulu
Ngakho-ke	bakholwa,	sabe	sesibanika	injabulo okwesikhashana
Ngakho-ke babuze ngakube okweNkosi yakho ngamadodakazi okwabo ngamadodana na
Noma sadala izingelosi zabangabesifazane kulapho bona bebhekile
Ngempela kungamanga abo abakushoyo
(Ukuthi)	Umvelinqangi	wazala	futhi	ngempela	bona banamanga
Wakhetha amadodakazi ngaphezulu kwamadodana na
Kwenzekani ngani nehlulela kanjani
Lapho-ke ngeke ukhunjuzwe
Noma ninegunya elicacile na
Ngakho-ke lethani incwadi yenu uma kungukuthi nineqiniso
Futhi benza ubudlelwane phakathi kwakhe namaJinn, futhi ngempela amaJinn azi kahle ukuthi ngempela wona ayolethwa ngaphambili
Makadunyiswe	uMvelinqangi	ngaphezulu	kwalokho abakuchazayo
Ngaphandle kwezinceku zikaMvelinqangi ezimsulwa
Ngakho-ke nina kanye nalokho enikukhonzayo
Angeke nibalinge ngaye
Ngaphandle kwalowo onqunyelwe ukusha esihogweni
Futhi akekho namunye wethu ngaphandle kwalowo onendawo eyaziwayo
Futhi ngempela thina sime ngolayini
Futhi ngempela thina singabadumisayo
Futhi babejwayele ukuthi
Ukube sasinaso isikhumbuzo esinjengesabantu basendulo
Sasizoba yizinceku zikaMvelinqangi eziqotho
Kepha abakholelwanga kusona, ngakho-ke bayokwazi
Futhi ngempela izwi lethu selahamba ngaphambili laya ezincekwini zethu, izithunywa
Ngempela zona okwazo ukwelekelelwa
Futhi ngempela amabutho ethu okwawo ukunqoba
Ngakho-ke suka kubona kuze kube yisikhashana
Futhi babone ngakho-ke nabo bazobona
Ngakube yisijeziso sethu abafuna ukuthi sisheshe
Ngakho-ke uma (isijeziso) sesehlela egcekeni labo ngakho-ke kuyokuba kubi ukusa kulabo abaxwayiswayo
Ngakho-ke suka kubona kuze kube yisikhashana
Futhi bheka, ngakho-ke nabo bayobona
Mayidunyiswe iNkosi yakho, iNkosi yamandla ngaphezulu kwalokho abakuchazayo
Futhi ukuthula makube phezulu kwezithunywa
Futhi udumo lungolukaMvelinqangi iNkosi yemihlaba
Swad, ngeQur’an enesikhumbuzo
Kepha labo abangakholwanga basekuziphazamiseni nasekuphikisaneni
Zingaki izizukulwane esazibhubhisa ngaphambilini kwabo ngakho-ke zakhala kulapho sasingekho isikhathi sokuphunyuka
Futhi bamangale ukuthi bafikelwe ngumxwayisi ophuma phakathi kwabo futhi abangakholwanga bathi, “lona ngumlubi umqambimanga”
Ngakube wenza izithixo uNkulunkulu oyedwa na? ngempela lokhu kuyinto emangalisayo
Futhi abaholi phakathi kwabo basuka bahamba, hambani futhi nibambelele ezithixweni zenu ngempela lokhu kuyinto ehlosiwe
Asikaze sizwe ngalokhu enkolweni yokugcina, lokhu akuyilutho ngaphandle komqambo
Ngakube sehliselwe phezulu kwakhe yini isikhumbuzo phakathi kwethu? Kepha bona basekungabazeni mayelana nesikhumbuzo, kepha abakasizwa isijeziso sami
Noma, ngakube banawo yini amagugu omusa weNkosi yakho ephakeme ngamandla, ephanayo
Nomaokwaboumbusowamazulunomhlabakanyenakokonke okuphakathi kwako kokubili? Ngakho-ke mabakhuphuke ngemizamo (yabo)
Isixuku esiyohlulwa lapho phakathi kwezinhlangano
Abantu baNowa baphika ngaphambilini kwabo kanye no-Ad noFaro
NoThamud nabantu baLothi kanye nezihlali zase-Ayka
Babengenzi lutho ngaphandle kokuphika izithunywa ngakho- ke saqiniseka isijeziso sami
Futhi laba abalindele lutho ngaphandle kokukhala (kwecilongo) okukodwa angeke kube nokulibala
Futhi bathi, “Nkosi yethu sisheshisele ingxenye yethu ngaphambili kosuku lokubala (lokwahlulela)”
Kubekezelele lokho abakushoyo futhi khumbula inceku yethu uDavide onamandla ngempela yena wayephendukela emumva ngokuzisola
Ngempela sazenza izintaba kanye naye ukuthi badumise (uMvelinqangi) kusihlwa nasekuseni
Kanye nezinyoni zaqoqana ndawonye, konke kwakumthobela
Futhi sawuqinisa umbuso wakhe futhi samupha ubuhlakani nokukhuluma
